channel.title: Jane Fraser on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Jane Fraser on FinanClub

item.title: Citigroup CEO Visits China as Wall Street Seeks Closer Ties
item.description: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser visited China this week, meeting with Chinese officials and executives to discuss potential areas of cooperation. Fraser’s visit comes as China’s economy is showing signs of recovery, and as the country’s government is looking to open up its financial markets to foreign investment.
